櫩字的基本解释

櫩
yán
〔步櫩〕檐下的走廊，如“櫩櫩周流，长途中宿。”
古同“檐”，屋檐。

櫩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《廣韻》余廉切，平鹽，以。］
(1)同“檐”。屋檐。
(2)檐下的走廊。

櫩字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫩； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页561第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?同簷。又砌也。【楚辭·大招】曲屋步櫩。【郭璞曰】中途樓閣閒陛道。　又廊也。【司馬相如·上林賦】步櫩周流。【李善註】步廊。　又【集韻】以冉切，音琰。【揚子·方言】秦晉續折木謂之櫩。

櫩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
櫩字的起名意思

暂无。

Yu
Basic explanation of words
Yu
yán
〔步櫩〕The corridor under the eaves, such as "Liuxiu Zhouliu, overnight in the long distance."
In ancient times, "eaves", eaves.
Yu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yán］
["Guangyun" Yu Lianqie, flat salt, with. ]
(1) Same as "Eaves". eaves.
(2) The corridor under the eaves.
Yu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　櫩; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 561 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Same eaves. Build it again. [Songs of the Chu · Big Move] Quwu step by step. [Guo Pu said] The pavilion walked leisurely in the middle of the road.　Also. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Step by step. [Li Shan's Note] Promenade.　 [Ji Yun] Yi Ran cut, Yin Yan. [Yangtze Dialect] Qin and Jin continuation of Zhemu is called Zhixiu.
